title: Welcome to My App
heroDescription: Connect with people who share your interests and passions. Our smart algorithm makes finding your ideal partner easier than ever.

about.title: About Elayk
about.subtitle: Elayk is more than just a dating app ‚Äì it‚Äôs a safe, vibrant space where people from all walks of life meet, connect, and create beautiful stories together.

cards.matchesDesc: Over one million hearts have found their perfect match with Elayk.
cards.securityDesc: Your privacy is our top priority with advanced encryption and verification.
cards.communityDesc: A welcoming community where conversations grow into relationships.

highlights.awardText: Recognized globally for innovation in online matchmaking.
highlights.diverseText: We embrace diversity and create spaces where everyone belongs.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Explore our innovative features designed to help you connect, chat, and build genuine relationships effortlessly.

advancedMatching.title: Advanced Matching
advancedMatching.desc: AI-powered matchmaking to find the most compatible partners for you.

secureChat.title: Secure Chat
secureChat.desc: End-to-end encrypted chat ensuring your conversations are private.

verifiedProfiles.title: Verified Profiles
verifiedProfiles.desc: Every user is verified to ensure authenticity and safety.

easySearch.title: Easy Search
easySearch.desc: Filter by interests, location, and more to find your perfect match.

terms.title: User Agreement
terms.intro_paragraph_1: Welcome to **Alike**! This User Agreement (¬´**Agreement**¬ª) is a legally binding contract between you (¬´**User**¬ª) and **Alike LLC** (¬´**Alike**¬ª, ¬´we¬ª, ¬´us¬ª, or ¬´our¬ª) governing your use of our dating platform, website, and related services (¬´**Service**¬ª).
terms.intro_paragraph_2: By accessing or using Alike, you agree to be bound by this Agreement and confirm that you are at least 18 years old.
terms.contact_us: For any questions, contact us at:

sections.title: 1. Eligibility
points: You must be a natural person aged 18 or older to use Alike.
You may not use Alike if you are prohibited by law in your country of residence.

sections.title: 2. Account Registration
points: You may register using email or third-party social networks.
You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials.

sections.title: 3. Paid Features
points: Alike offers paid services, including: ¬´Invisible¬ª mode (browse anonymously), Ability to send and read messages, Profile boosting (top listing), Digital gifts, Subscription plans.
Payment is required in advance. All purchases are final and non-refundable, except as required by law.

sections.title: 4. Content and Conduct
points: Users are solely responsible for all content they post.
Alike is not responsible for false, misleading, or inappropriate user information.
You agree not to: Impersonate others, Post illegal, offensive, or harmful content, Solicit money or engage in fraudulent behavior.

sections.title: 5. No Identity Verification
points: We do not verify users' identities, documents, or passports. Please exercise caution when communicating with others.

sections.title: 6. Termination
points: We may suspend or terminate your access to the Service at our discretion, especially if you violate this Agreement.

sections.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
points: Alike is not liable for: User behavior, Unsuccessful matches, Any damages resulting from the use of the Service.

sections.title: 8. Privacy
points: See our Privacy Policy for how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.

sections.title: 9. Jurisdiction
points: This Agreement is governed by the laws of the State of Delaware, United States, without regard to its conflict of law principles.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro_text: Alike LLC (‚ÄúAlike,‚Äù ‚Äúwe,‚Äù ‚Äúus,‚Äù or ‚Äúour‚Äù) respects your privacy. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal data when you use the Alike dating platform, website, and related services (‚ÄúService‚Äù).

section_1_points.label: Account Information:
section_1_points.text: email, name, date of birth, gender, preferences

section_2_points.label: To provide and operate the Service
To match users and display relevant profiles
To process payments for premium features
To improve and personalize the platform

privacy.section_3_intro: We may share your data with:

section_3_points.label: If required by law or to protect rights

privacy.section_3_outro: We do not sell your personal data.
privacy.section_4_text: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve the user experience, analyze traffic, and personalize content.
privacy.section_5_text: Your data may be transferred to and processed in countries outside of your own. We take appropriate measures to protect your data.
privacy.section_6_text: We store your data as long as your account is active or as necessary to comply with legal obligations.
privacy.section_7_intro: Depending on your location, you may have the right to:

section_7_points.label: Access, correct, or delete your data
Object to or restrict certain processing
Lodge a complaint with a data protection authority

privacy.section_8_text: The Service is intended for users 18 and older. We do not knowingly collect data from minors.
privacy.section_9_text: We use encryption, firewalls, and other technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data.
privacy.section_10_text_2: We may update this Privacy Policy. If there are material changes, we will notify you through the Service or by other means.
